text: Morgan Lewis (October 16, 1754 – April 7, 1844) was an American lawyer, politician, and military commander. He was in the New York State Assembly (1789, 1792) and the New York State Senate (1811–1814) and was State Attorney General (1791–1801) and the fourth Governor of New York (1804–1807). ==References== Category:1754 births Category:1844 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Lawyers from New York City Category:Governors of New York (state) Category:Military people from New York (state) Category:Politicians from New York City Category:New York State attorneys general
title: Morgan Lewis
